title: Excommunicator

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attack someone each night. You must disguise their cause of death as an evil killing role that could possibly appear in the current game. You must disguise all your attacks with the same cause of death.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Under a Full Moon, your ability is Astral.
- During Night 4, you will mimic the mechanics of your disguised cause of death.
- You will appear to be 658: Invoker to all investigative effects.

desc:
Post 618
*My practices may be forbidden, but I will see your evil gone!*
Roleblock immune
